attributes.action: recognise 29th February as an official non-working day when it falls on a weekday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Two of London's creative agencies genuinely believe that 29th Feb should belong to the people as a non-working day.  The reasons for this are; as a four-yearly quirk in the Gregorian calendar, the 29th Feb doesn't belong to anyone, it doesn’t form part of our holiday entitlement, we are not paid for it and we don’t have enough bank holidays in the UK.

We are building a website to encourage people to sign this petition for Freeday Friday. We plan to offer individuals & companies within the UK and potentially worldwide, the opportunity to vote and encourage you, the government, to allow us this extra day off work.  We plan to market the site and track its success.
